flawed_nl_solution:
The squirrel split the 210 acorns into thirds, so it had 3 piles of 210 / 3 = <<210/3=70>>70 acorns.
It took 70 - 60 = <<70-60=14>>14 from each pile.
The squirrel will have 3 * 14 = <<3*14=42>>42 acorns to eat at the beginning of spring.
#### 42

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
